channel.title: ~~~ Deezed Pures ~~~ 40+ Clan~~~ Read~~~ Join us~~~
channel.description:
POST YOUR IN-GAME NAME IF U WANT TO REGISTER PLEASE!
Hi, I Created Deezed Pures because i've seen a few clans without proper rules and very un-orginized, so i started my own clan and hope it becomes as good, So please join and participate in this clan i am sure it will become very good.Make sure your 40+ and read the following posts.
Thanks.
First off to become a Deezed Pure you need to be level 40+,
Rangers: 50+ Range
Mage: 50+ Mage
Melee: 40+ Attack 50+Strength _______________________________________________
Application:
Attack: Strength: Hitpoints: Deffence: Prayer: Mage: Range: Are you loyal: Best Non-combat skill: you will need to use the website to find out when events are too so..Will you use the website: Im game name:
WWW.FREEWEBS.COM/DEEZEDPURES
________________________________________________
Uniform
Uniforms are always a big problem for some people.So i made to so you can buy it from Varrock Cloth Store So the Uniform for Deezedpure is:
Black top No cape No hat
( WHEN CLAN BUILDS WE CAN CHANGE IT SO DONT WORRY )
__________________________________________________________________ Were We Meet
Deezed Pures Main World is 126 BY CHURCH IN VARROCK! we will soon move to a different world and pk
_____________________________________________________ The Rules ________
1. NO BSING 2. NO SWEARING 3. NO LIEING 4. NO 3 ITEM 5. OBEY RULES 6. ALWAYS OBEY THE LEADER 7. NO MULTI CLANING 8. ALWAYS WEAR UNIFORM 9. IGNORE RANDOM NOOBS ON THE WAY TO A CLAN WAR OR ANYTHING ELSE
------------------- Allies ---------------------
1.Kamakazi Pures kp 2.Death On Site ds 3.Bush indianz bi 4.Wanted pures wp
LEADERS AND CO-LEADERS -------------------------------------- 1.Demon S T R1 - LEADER 2.Dem0n S T R1- LEADER 2 3.aeons world- CO-LEADER
-------------------------------------- Member's --------------------------------------
1.1sir legalas 2.p0t N dr0p1 3. bd 0wnz 4.69killer13 5.ph0b0s1 6.wantedpurex2 7.cocane44 8.Nubz dl3 sl0 9.mage br0 07 10.skylark 222 11.Primo 12.run3ranger 1 13.mr gurly808 14.destr0yer92 15.monkinrobes 16.monksinrobes 17.0l phenix i0 18.Honor squire 19.moomoomepoo 20.pur3 wi1dy 21.Evilethan7 22.Xxpk3r10lxx 23.Mini rawad 24.pk4pk 25.the 4th pony 26.Shoot Here
To check Out most events and more check out the website:
www.freewebs.com/deezedpures

item.title: ~~~ Deezed Pures ~~~ 40+ Clan~~~ Read~~~ Join us~~~
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Your posts are so cryptic.

exe626:

I honestly didn’t think you played Runescape legit.

Why not?

exe626:

Yes you, I thought you joined these forums just to be here.

I joined Kaitnieks to cheat, and I joined Mitb because I like Kaitnieks.

exe626:

Are you the same legit that was here the other day? You seem different ;\

How so?

Read full topic
